statements: SELECT * FROM customer_segments;
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_id = 1;
SELECT segment_id, segment_name, segment_criteria FROM customer_segments ORDER BY segment_id DESC;
SELECT segment_name FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_description ILIKE '%sample%';
SELECT * FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_criteria->>'age' = '25';
SELECT * FROM customer_segments ORDER BY segment_id DESC;
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_id > 100;
SELECT segment_name, segment_criteria FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_name LIKE '%loyal%';
SELECT * FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_id = 50 OR segment_id = 75;
SELECT segment_id, segment_name FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_criteria->>'age' > '30';
SELECT * FROM customer_segmentation;
SELECT customer_name, age, gender FROM customer_segmentation ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT customer_name, segmentation_category, email FROM customer_segmentation WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, segmentation_category, age, gender FROM customer_segmentation WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT customer_name, age, email, phone_number FROM customer_segmentation WHERE segmentation_category = 'Premium' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_segmentation WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, segmentation_category FROM customer_segmentation WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT DISTINCT segmentation_category FROM customer_segmentation WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_segmentation WHERE segmentation_category = 'VIP';
SELECT * FROM customer_segmentation WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age <= 40 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_segments;
SELECT customer_name, segment_id FROM customers;
SELECT promotion_name, start_date, end_date FROM promotions;
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM customer_segments;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, segment_id FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_segments;
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM customer_segments;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, segment_name FROM customers JOIN customer_segments ON customers.segment_id = customer_segments.segment_id;
SELECT promotion_name, start_date, end_date FROM promotions WHERE segment_id = 2 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT promotion_name, segment_name FROM promotions JOIN customer_segments ON promotions.segment_id = customer_segments.segment_id WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customer_segments;
SELECT segment_id, segment_name FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_id IN ('1b24ec4b-cf8b-4e43-961e-cf4480bb2384', '74cf7c05-5d42-4fd2-a7f4-225f32812ba2');
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE segment_id = '74cf7c05-5d42-4fd2-a7f4-225f32812ba2';
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT promotion_name, product_name FROM promotions JOIN products ON promotions.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_segments
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT product_name, product_description FROM products WHERE LENGTH(product_description) > 100
SELECT promotion_name, product_name FROM promotions JOIN products ON promotions.product_id = products.product_id
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_name LIKE '%VIP%'
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT promotion_name, discount FROM promotions WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';

SELECT customer_name, segment_name, description FROM customers INNER JOIN customer_segments ON customers.customer_id = customer_segments.customer_id INNER JOIN segments ON customer_segments.segment_id = segments.segment_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT segment_name, description FROM segments ORDER BY segment_id DESC;
SELECT c.customer_name, p.promotion_name FROM customers c JOIN promotions p ON c.customer_id = p.promotion_id;

SELECT c.customer_name, s.segment_name, p.promotion_name FROM customers c JOIN customer_segments cs ON c.customer_id = cs.customer_id JOIN segments s ON cs.segment_id = s.segment_id JOIN promotions p ON cs.segment_id = p.promotion_id WHERE p.discount > 0.1;
